summary: Because the default ones could be better.
descriptionHtml:
This adds five "better-than-default-wifes-looking" potential wifes to the game. To marry, follow the same procedure as with marrying any other NPC.

Locations:

Elena Windrider - Nord - Riften

Hannah Bridesgroom - Imperial - Left of Jorrvaskr at Whiterun

Aren Kynareth - Dark Elf - Solitude

N'iqua - Khajit - Markarth

Aileen the Wonderful - Redguard - Riften
===========================================================================================

Note:
[Works with Hearthfire]
[Works with the Animated Prostitution Mod] (You kinky bastard xD)
[More Wifes will be added in the Future]
author: MrFallout98
